title: Ohr Sameach on Mishneh Torah, Transmission of the Oral Law
text: "In the introduction of Rabbeinu, in the critique of Raavad, at the beginning of 'and Shmuel and R' Yehuda...' and 'R' Yossi bar Lakunya...'. Nota Bene: also R' Natan ben Amram, Avodah Zarah 37b. In the introduction of Maran Kesef Mishneh, and there the author of Magid Mishneh mentioned... Nota Bene: this is explicitly written in Rivash in his response to the Ran, Siman 388, see there; and he responded to his descendants in Siman 473."
heTitle: אור שמח על משנה תורה, מסירת תורה שבעל פה
